TopicTitle: Is there a Mod that gives intuitive/fantasy controls in space

Articles.Content: This may sound stupid, but is there a mod or kOS script that makes your spaceship behave like a plane in the air. Similar to Star Wars Ort other non-realistic space flight games. This could be done either by compensating the players thrust and simultane air resistance using the ship's engines like in Elite Dangerous or by adding a new part that has completely different physics than the rest of the game.
